trans-unit.source: Initializes new instances of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpRemotingHandler"></xref> class.
The current class dynamically manufactures new instances of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpRemotingHandler> class.
trans-unit.target: 현재 클래스는 <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpRemotingHandler>클래스</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpRemotingHandler> 의 새 인스턴스를 동적으로 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpRemotingHandler"></xref> class.
For more information about the current method, see <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandlerFactory.GetHandler%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 현재 메서드에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandlerFactory.GetHandler%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.IHttpHandlerFactory.GetHandler%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> class that provides references to intrinsic server objects (for example, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Request" name="Request" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Response" name="Response" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Session" name="Session" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_Server" name="Server" href=""></xref>) used to service HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스는 <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> 내장 서버 개체에 대 한 참조를 제공 하는 클래스 (예를 들어 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Request" name="Request" href=""> </xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Response" name="Response" href=""> </xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Session" name="Session" href=""> </xref>, 및 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Server" name="Server" href=""> </xref>) HTTP 요청을 처리 하는 데 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The HTTP data transfer method (<xref uid="langword_csharp_GET" name="GET" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_POST" name="POST" href=""></xref>) that the client uses.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 데이터 전송 메서드입니다 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_GET" name="GET" href=""> </xref> 또는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_POST" name="POST" href=""> </xref>) 클라이언트가 사용 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpRemotingHandler"></xref> that processes the request.
Enables a factory to reuse the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpRemotingHandler"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 팩터리에서 지정 된 다시 사용할 수 있도록 <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpRemotingHandler"> </xref>합니다.
